short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks and displays game scores from The Zetamac Arithmetic (DEFAULT MODE), allowing users to monitor their performance over time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: https://arithmetic.zetamac.com/ offers an engaging way to sharpen your mental arithmetic through daily practice. This extension directly integrates with Zetamac's default mode, allowing you to effortlessly monitor and analyze your performance over time.
